```{r}
tbl(conStudent,'internship') %>% inner_join(tbl(conStudent,'graduation')) %>% select(graduationId,jobTitle,internshipPaid) %>% 
  filter(internshipPaid == 'Yes') %>% count(internshipPaid)
```

```{r}
tbl(conStudent,'internship') %>% inner_join(tbl(conStudent,'graduation')) %>% select(graduationId,jobTitle,internshipPaid) %>% 
  filter(internshipPaid == 'No') %>% count(internshipPaid)
```

```{r}
tbl(conStudent,'internship') %>% inner_join(tbl(conStudent,'graduation')) %>% select(graduationId,jobTitle,internshipPaid)%>% count(internshipPaid) %>% 
  filter(!is.na(internshipPaid))
```

```{r}
tbl(conStudent,'internship') %>% inner_join(tbl(conStudent,'graduation')) %>% select(graduationId,jobTitle,internshipPaid)%>% count(internshipPaid) %>% 
  filter(!is.na(internshipPaid)) %>% collect() %>% 
  ggplot()+
  geom_col(aes(internshipPaid, n))
```
